data.text: Christa in eini ningle-nuomma anamasuo jei! Khawa ninglenuom kha eini'n nichangjei. Khawa jarra ninglenuom mi ngai angnga ngirru, halli woikhat suok enasik ningtheinuo-ah inzoot khaimaru.
Rangairu! Paul kei'n kinarilpi eii, nangni'n ningtheinuo-ah wun tansik ningzoot inchu, nangnisik Christa kha anemna omkhaimakjei.
Tu e-innum wun tansik kazoot mi khan, Dan rakip kha ama'n ajui mintungsik ejei; tihi kei'n woikhat chong kimakhai eii.
Dan juiya Pathian le inngeiya omsuom nasik katho ningkarra mi ngaikha intheinuo-ah Christa ah inphut ning-inthen jei. Nangni Pathian riangwaiya inphut kalaak ah ning omjei.
Einisik achu, Pathian amale inruoiya inngei anamin esik hi ningamna chungnga Pathian Ratha raatna khan chuon athosik hi eini'n ningamna ah ningaak kha eii.
Ajarchu Christa Jisu le ni-inchunna suungnga wuntan emakli tanmak iteii inteina ommakjei, takkha arei ka-eii khachu minriangle inruoiya chuon katho ngamna khan eii.
Nangni katha tak-ah ningleitho jei! akatuun juina hin tu-inme naka-ook? angtho thoa ama'n namatheem me?
Khawa kha nangni kanakoi, Pathian itho emak.
“Chol lekteii khan cholpeek pumpui aminthei!” inti ka-ang eii. 1 Cor 5:6

Takkha tuun katung nangni kanalangamna, Pumi le inruoiya eini ringkhuo ni-inchunna jarra nangni intei malungroon inkhat roon nutun tia kana-inngamna, hanna tu-ennum nangni aluk alet kanatho miring kha Pathian in arachaaksik eii.

Takkha keisik achu, ulenai ngai, tuun katung wuntan nasik hi arei kaomdoomma kalaril inchu, angsikme kei tuun katung innalaminpoong hi? Khawa ngaikha akatuun e-inchu, Christa Cross jarra karilna hin poongna masuoknuni.
Nangni aluk alet kanatho mi ngaikhan inmani inpumtak in intak-inboolsik hi kei'n kamanuom!

Nangnisik achu, ulenai ngai, nangni chu ningle-nuomma kaomsik ah inakoi ning-eii. Takkha hiwa nangni ninglenuom hin ningtaksa manuom matorna kha min-e maru, khawa rathuulla inkhat li inkhat minriangna tiangkhan sepa inthoru.
Ajarchu, “Napumtak ni-inriang angnga, na-indiang ni-inwaipui ngaikha minriangro.” Iti hin Dan pumpui kha chongpeii inkhat-ah inchunjei. Levi 19:18
Takkha nangni'n ramsa ngai omchan angnga inkhat li inkhat ning-induol khat-um ning in-ei inchu, nangni inkhat li inkhat ningmang wiaksik eii tihi insing theiru.
Kei'n hiwahi kinarilpi eii: miring taksa manuom mintung maknasik, Ratha khan ningringkhuo lam nakeipi rase.

Ajarchu eini miring taksa imanuom khan Ratha imanuom khale inhal, halli Ratha imanuom khannum eini miring taksa imanuom khale inhal. Hiwa innihi inhal in-eii, khawa jarra, nangni'n ningthozoot kha nangni'n thotheinutun jei. Rom 7:15-23
Nangni Ratha khan anaruoijei e-inchu, nangni Dan nuoiya khan ommakchu jei.
Miring taksa omchan chuontho khachu hin thoa inlar. Khawa ngai khachu, zool-inthai, inthiangmak halli chuonkathamak ngai katho;
inbool pathian ramil chubei katho halli dooile ai kachoi. Mi inhalpui ngai, insuol-inkhal, kara-ot, karaang, atheinuosik kangaidon khat-um rup li rahooi kakhoithen;

phamrai kase, ju-inrui, jurui saakkhop katho, halli hiwa ka-ang aleiilak omchan ngaihi intho eii. Matiangnga angnga, kei'n tuunnum nangnidiang kinaminjet eii. Hiwa ngai omchan katho ngaikhan Pathian Rengram kha mununu.
Takkha ratha kara khachu; minriang, karok, kadai, kadeiraat, minriangkajet, akatha, ngamna kaom,
mi inriang khat-um atheinuo-ah insur mator, ngaihi eii. Hiwa ngai inhalpuisik Dan iteii ommakjei.
Halli Christa Jisu ta ka-eii mi ngai khachu inmani miring taksa manuom le rangaina sengkha inminthisuo jei.
Ratha khan eini ringna anapejei, ama tak-in niringkhuo hi-um anaruoisik eii.
Eini in-or emui emakli eini inkhat li inkhat inrilthaimui emakli inkhat li inkhat in-ot mui.
